channel.title: Main screen help
channel.description: Okay, well, the topic name doesn't well describe my problem, but I don't know how to name it, or if this problem's been discussed and solved somewhere else, I'm sorry if it has, and if you can give me the link, I'll be more than thankful. My problem: The flames and the RuneScape logo when you're logging in, how do you get rid of that? Please help. :confused:

item.title: Main screen help
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe
item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

The logo and flames have nothing to do with sprites. They are methods inside the client’s main file. I haven’t done in a while, so I don’t know the exact method. But the logo, can easily be removed by replacing the logo.dat file inside the cache using, Tom’s Cache Suite.

Read full topic

item.title: Main screen help
item.dc:creator: @baselm baselm
item.description:
@baselm wrote:

at sprites or interface folder i guess, u can change them
and if u r talking about the background, its usually found at ur main client folder

Read full topic

item.title: Main screen help
item.dc:creator: @chargerz chargerz
item.description:
@chargerz wrote:

lol u mean changing the background?
If it’s a 317 im pretty sure it would be in sprites.
I dont know anything about 508’s.
Well if it’s in sprites get a new bg and save it as the same name to replace it.

Read full topic
